ED_DecisionText: At its 102nd plenary meeting, on 9 September 2021, the General Assembly decided to defer consideration of the item entitled “Multilingualism” as well as the reports of the Secretary-General  and the Joint Inspection Unit  and to include the item in the draft agenda of its seventy-sixth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
